revised_title: Contributions to the Physiology of Batrachian Lymph-Hearts: Action of Electrical Currents
tldr: The author investigates the physiology of batrachian lymph-hearts, focusing on their anatomical structure, normal beating rate, and the effects of electrical currents on their function. The study also examines the role of the spinal cord and nerve function in controlling the lymph-hearts' rhythm and the impact of cardiac drugs on their activity.
